item.title: Barrett and Sotomayor tag-team interrogation of Trump lawyer on tariff powers
item.description: Supreme Court justices expressed skepticism about Donald Trump's use of emergency law to impose global tariffs during oral arguments Wednesday.

item.title: Trump appears to jab defeated Republicans, saying it's 'easy' to win elections 'when you talk about the facts'
item.description: President Donald Trump criticized Republican candidates after Tuesday's election losses, claiming winning is "easy" when focusing on the "facts."

item.title: Vulnerable House Dem criticizes 'extreme' left in shocking 2026 announcement
item.description: Rep. Jared Golden, a moderate Democrat, is not running for re-election in 2026, he announced on Wednesday.

item.title: Bernie Sanders crashes Schumer news conference, criticizes Democratic Party leadership
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders criticized Democratic Party leadership for lack of support in key races as political tensions rise within the party following rece...
